src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.reporting.query.impl
Class AbstractQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.reporting.query.impl.AbstractQueryBuilder

class AbstractQueryBuilder

Basic query builder functionallity description, its subclasses has the responsibilty of adding to stringQuery and queryParameters of the QueryObject a part of string and an entry respectively
